title: Publicaciones
text:
Previas al comienzo del proyecto

Oh, J., Batory, D., Heradio, R. Finding Near-optimal Configurations in Colossal Spaces with Statistical Guarantees. ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology, 33(1), 2023, Q1 in cat. COMPUTER SCIENCE, SOFTWARE ENGINEERING.
Fernandez-Amoros, D. , Heradio, R., C. Mayr-Dorn, and A. Egyed. Scalable Sampling of Highly- Configurable Systems: Generating Random Instances of the Linux Kernel. In IEEE/ACM Int. Conf. on Automated Software Engineering (ASE), Oakland Center, MI, USA, 2022, GGS Class 2.

Fernandez-Amoros, D., Heradio, R., Mayr-Dorn, C., and Egyed, A. A Kconfig translation to logic with one-way validation system. In ACM Int. Systems and Software Product Line Conf. (SPLC), Paris, France, 2019, GGS Class 2.

title: Datasets
text:
30 random samples of 1,000 configurations for Kconfig-based systems, including, the Linux Kernel, axtls, barebox-x86, buildroot, busybox, coreboot, embtoolkit, etaos-avr, fiasco, freetz, halm, klipper, mplayer, openbios-x86, rnk-arm, seabios, swupdate, toybox, u-boot, uClibc-ng, and xelix. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.14204174
10 random samples of 1,000 configurations for 10 versions of the Linux Kernel: 2.6.0, 3.9.4, 4.4.302, 4.10.1, 4.19.311, 5.4.273, 5.10.214, 5.15.153, 6.1.10, and 6.8.4. DOI:10.5281/zenodo.11030416
Dataset and source code for the paper “Finding Near-Optimal Configurations in Colossal Product Spaces with Statistical Confidence”. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.7776627
SAT Instances for Testing SFpC Validity and Reliability. DOI: : 10.5281/zenodo.5509947
SAT Instances for Testing Random Samplers’ Uniformity. DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.4514919

title: Advanced support for COnfigurable software SYstems (COSY)
text:
Proyecto PID2022-142043NB-I00
Duración: desde 01/09/2023 hasta 31/08/2026
Financiado por MCIN/AEI/10.13039/501100011033/ y por FEDER Una manera de hacer Europa

title: Software
text:
randconfig+: A sampler for Kconfig-based systems, including, the Linux Kernel, axtls, barebox-x86, buildroot, busybox, coreboot, embtoolkit, etaos-avr, fiasco, freetz, halm, klipper, mplayer, openbios-x86, rnk-arm, seabios, swupdate, toybox, u-boot, uClibc-ng, and xelix.
bdd4va: BDDs for Variability Analysis
KconfigSampler: Scalable Sampling of Highly-Configurable Systems: Generating Random Instances of the Linux Kernel
SFpC: a test for validating SAT samplers’ uniformity
